content:
The R5 definition of Consent.verification.verifiedBy reads:

The person who conducted the verification/validation of the Grantee decision.

Shouldn't this be the "Grantor" decision? Definitions of both:

  • Consent.grantor = "The entity responsible for granting the rights listed in a Consent Directive."
  • Consent.grantee = "The entity responsible for complying with the Consent Directive, including any obligations or limitations on authorizations and enforcement of prohibitions."
Yes, it should. Can you put in a jira ticket as a Technical Correction?
I take full blame for the typo
